name: Slimy 2
description:
Slimy 2 is an action survival game where you play as Slimy, a robot that doesn't know where he is or where he's going. Play through nine worlds of ninety levels of confusion and loneliness in Tradition Hand Drawn Animated Graphics!

Controls:

Arrow Keys: Move

Space Bar: Pause

Enter: Skip Cutscenes and Intro Sequences

Mouse: Click Buttons

I hope you enjoy Slimy 2 and I hope you look forward to my future games. And don't forget to comment and review Slimy 2. So enjoy!

Notice: The game saves automatically at the start of each level.

Click here to listen to Slimy 2's full OST.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLt2pekTo-iD_BOcyRdTlqnmMa8CE3yCM-
